name: Labyrinth - Escape
description:
Randomly generated Maze - Dark Theme
You need to find the Exit, but watch out for the ghosts haunting you!

Adjust number of enemies & labyrinth size.

(press Escape in level to give up and again to return to Menu)

Also see my Android Game spin off with gyroscope tilting mechanism and Bombs:

https://tommigreenbay.itch.io/maze-roller
